author: Staff Reporter
text:
V.M. Muthukumar, Vice-Chancellor, Bharathidasan University, felicitating gold medal-winning athlete M. Manikandan in Tiruchi on Thursday.

M. Manikandan, representing Bharathidasan University, won gold medal in the all-India inter-university athletics meet held in Patiala recently.

Manikandan, a student of St. Joseph’s College here, won the 3,000 metres steeplechase event and set a new meet record clocking 9 minutes, 18.37 seconds.

V.M. Muthukumar, Vice-Chancellor, Bharathidasan University, felicitated the athlete in the presence of A. Palanisamy, associate professor and sports secretary, Bharathidasan University.
title: V-C felicitates medal winner
